languages.text: {n}Маражай смеется.{/n} "Слова слабосильной кузины из рода, который привык обвинять в своих бедах неподвластные им силы. Ты хочешь истину или ложь вымирающих Азуриани?"

{n}Marazhai laughs.{/n} "The words of a feeble cousin from a breed accustomed to blaming all their woes on forces outside their control. Do you want the truth, or the lie the Asuryani tell themselves as they teeter on the edge of extinction?"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай смеется.{/n} "Слова слабосильной кузины из рода, который привык обвинять в своих бедах неподвластные им силы. Ты хочешь истину или ложь вымирающих Азуриани?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai laughs.{/n} "The words of a feeble cousin from a breed accustomed to blaming all their woes on forces outside their control. Do you want the truth, or the lie the Asuryani tell themselves as they teeter on the edge of extinction?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se ríe.{/n} «Las palabras de una prima endeble perteneciente a una raza acostumbrada a echar la culpa de sus problemas a fuerzas ajenas a su control. ¿Quieres oír la verdad, o prefieres la mentira que se cuentan los Asuryani mientras se asoman al borde de la extinción?».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs.{/n} "The words of a feeble cousin from a breed accustomed to blaming all their woes on forces outside their control. Do you want the truth, or the lie the Asuryani tell themselves as they teeter on the edge of extinction?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se ríe.{/n} «Las palabras de una prima endeble perteneciente a una raza acostumbrada a echar la culpa de sus problemas a fuerzas ajenas a su control. ¿Quieres oír la verdad, o prefieres la mentira que se cuentan los Asuryani mientras se asoman al borde de la extinción?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋哈哈大笑。{/n}“听听我那个孱弱的表亲都说了些什么吧，他们总是喜欢把一切不幸归咎于无法控制的力量。你是想听实话，还是想听方舟灵族濒临灭绝时自欺欺人的谎言？”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs.{/n} "The words of a feeble cousin from a breed accustomed to blaming all their woes on forces outside their control. Do you want the truth, or the lie the Asuryani tell themselves as they teeter on the edge of extinction?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋哈哈大笑。{/n}“听听我那个孱弱的表亲都说了些什么吧，他们总是喜欢把一切不幸归咎于无法控制的力量。你是想听实话，还是想听方舟灵族濒临灭绝时自欺欺人的谎言？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは笑う。{/n}「すべての苦悩を自分たちではコントロールの及ばない力のせいにすることに慣れている種族の、か弱いいとこが言った言葉だ。お前が望むのは真実なのか？それとも絶滅の危機に瀕しているアシュリヤーニたちが自らをだますために言う嘘なのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs.{/n} "The words of a feeble cousin from a breed accustomed to blaming all their woes on forces outside their control. Do you want the truth, or the lie the Asuryani tell themselves as they teeter on the edge of extinction?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは笑う。{/n}「すべての苦悩を自分たちではコントロールの及ばない力のせいにすることに慣れている種族の、か弱いいとこが言った言葉だ。お前が望むのは真実なのか？それとも絶滅の危機に瀕しているアシュリヤーニたちが自らをだますために言う嘘なのか？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai éclate de rire.{/n} « Ce ne sont guère que les allégations d'une cousine faible d'esprit, issue d'une race habituée à mettre tous ses malheurs sur le compte de forces extérieures échappant à son contrôle. Vous voulez la vérité, ou vous préférez vous contenter des mensonges que les Asuryanis se racontent pour se rassurer à la perspective de leur extinction imminente ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs.{/n} "The words of a feeble cousin from a breed accustomed to blaming all their woes on forces outside their control. Do you want the truth, or the lie the Asuryani tell themselves as they teeter on the edge of extinction?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai éclate de rire.{/n} « Ce ne sont guère que les allégations d'une cousine faible d'esprit, issue d'une race habituée à mettre tous ses malheurs sur le compte de forces extérieures échappant à son contrôle. Vous voulez la vérité, ou vous préférez vous contenter des mensonges que les Asuryanis se racontent pour se rassurer à la perspective de leur extinction imminente ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lacht.{/n} "Die Worte schwacher, entfernter Blutsverwandtschaft aus einem Volk, das es gewohnt ist, all seine Sorgen auf Kräfte außerhalb seiner Kontrolle zu schieben. Wollt Ihr die Wahrheit hören oder die Lüge, die die Asuryani sich selbst erzählen, während sie am Rand der Auslöschung taumeln?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs.{/n} "The words of a feeble cousin from a breed accustomed to blaming all their woes on forces outside their control. Do you want the truth, or the lie the Asuryani tell themselves as they teeter on the edge of extinction?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lacht.{/n} "Die Worte schwacher, entfernter Blutsverwandtschaft aus einem Volk, das es gewohnt ist, all seine Sorgen auf Kräfte außerhalb seiner Kontrolle zu schieben. Wollt Ihr die Wahrheit hören oder die Lüge, die die Asuryani sich selbst erzählen, während sie am Rand der Auslöschung taumeln?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs.{/n} "The words of a feeble cousin from a breed accustomed to blaming all their woes on forces outside their control. Do you want the truth, or the lie the Asuryani tell themselves as they teeter on the edge of extinction?"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai gülüyor.{/n} "Başlarına gelen her şeyden dış kuvvetleri sorumlu tutanlara mensup, âciz soydaşımdan beklenecek sözler. Gerçeği mi duymak istiyorsun yoksa tükenmenin eşiğindeki Asuryanilerin uydurduğu yalanları mı?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs.{/n} "The words of a feeble cousin from a breed accustomed to blaming all their woes on forces outside their control. Do you want the truth, or the lie the Asuryani tell themselves as they teeter on the edge of extinction?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gülüyor.{/n} "Başlarına gelen her şeyden dış kuvvetleri sorumlu tutanlara mensup, âciz soydaşımdan beklenecek sözler. Gerçeği mi duymak istiyorsun yoksa tükenmenin eşiğindeki Asuryanilerin uydurduğu yalanları mı?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
